text: We would also like to send out our heartfelt condolences to the deceased’s families. #BridgeCollapse
Mediocrity is always associated with de darker pigment. When a we get de biz, its a tender; when dey get it its a contract. #BridgeCollapse
Our thoughts & prayers are with everyone who’s been affected by the #BridgeCollapse in Gauteng .
Wonder where the structure that collapse was ordered from. Wish its not from China. Nothing last from them #BridgeCollapse
